title: Rainbow Boats of Cinque Terre
description: Oil on canvas. 2023. This is a 2 point perspective piece of a photo I took while in Cinque Terre, Italy.

title: Il Duomo from Bardini Guardens
description: Oil on canvas. 2022. I created this image from a photo I took while in Florence, Italy. It was featured in the Summer Italy show at the Academy of Art in 2022.

title: Venice Mask Shop
description: Oil on canvas. 2022. I painted this while in Italy. It was featured in the Summer Italy show at the Academy of Art in 2022.

title: Replica of Matisse Cat Painting
description: Acrylic on canvas. 2023. I painted this replica while teaching a class on Matisse. I modified the colors because of limited painting material.

title: Still Life Reflection Study
description: Oil on canvas. 2021. I painted this for my Still Life class. It's a collection of items I had around the house. We had to use a limited pallette.

title: A Grandmother's Love
description: Oil on canvas. 2022. I painted this picture for my mother for her birthday. It's of my grandmother, myself and my sister when we were children.

title: Illustration Study: Old Man Sitting
description: chaoroal on paper. 2018. I drew this for a final in my figure drawing class. I had trouble with the face, but the muscle-tone in the body came out nicely.
